LanguageData.JobInBar_ShowJobLabelFor: Show job title in colonist bar
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_Enabled_desc: Use this to disable the mod entirely if things are behaving strangely.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_DrawBG_desc: Draw a black box behind the job title, just like the name label.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_Truncate_desc: If turned off, long job titles will overflow. Looks ugly but might be the behavior you want.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_HideDrafted_desc: Hides the job title label when the colonist is drafted. Helpful when using other colonist bar mods like Show Draftees Weapon.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_OffsetWhenWeaponEquipp: Offset to move the labels by when the pawn in question has a weapon equipped. Looks better with the mod Show Draftees Weapon to move labels out of the way of the weapon display.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_Job_desc: Draws a colonist's current job. The main function of the mod.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_CurrentJobHeader: Note that the current task is only shown when the mouse is hovered, for performance reasons.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_DrawCurrentJob_desc: If enabled, a label will be drawn for the job that a pawn is currently performing (ie cleaning/crafting/building). Note that the label will only be drawn for a pawn the mouse is hovering over for performance and visual clutter reasons.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_DrawOnlyOnHover: Only show labels on mouse hover
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_DrawOnlyOnHover_desc: Only draws labels for pawns the mouse is currently hovering over in the colonist bar.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_Role_desc: If Ideology is installed, draws the specialist roles in the color of their ideology below the job label.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_RoleColor_desc: Turn this off if the ideology color makes it hard to read the specialist role color or you find it distracting.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_RoleColorAbility: Only use role color if ability cooldown is ready
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_RoleColorAbility_desc: If enabled, the ideology role color will only be used if the role's ability cooldown is complete and the ability can be used. Otherwise will be the same color as the name label.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_Title_desc: If Royalty is installed, draws the royal titles owned by a pawn below the job label.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_DefaultShow_desc: Sets the default for if job labels should be shown. Can be toggled individually per-colonist.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_OnlyDrawJobIfCustom_de: Job titles are only shown if you set a custom job title for the pawn (using the rename dialog). This setting is recommended for larger colonies.
LanguageData.JobInBar_Settings_PerformanceWarning: Note on Performance: For large colonies, it is recommended to tweak these settings so that fewer labels are drawn overall. Unity's text rendering code is not the most optimized, so if there are a ton of labels being drawn all the time you might notice a slight performance dip (the more labels the worse it will be).
LanguageData.JobInBar_PlaySettingsToggle: Show/hide job labels in the colonist bar. Disabling this can slightly improve performance in large colonies.
